member.name: CONFIRM_CONFLICT_ITEM.pszOriginalName
member.summary: A pointer to the original name. If set to NULL then IShellItem's display name will be used.

member.name: CONFIRM_CONFLICT_ITEM.pszAlternateName
member.summary: A pointer to the alternate name. If multiple items are kept, then item must be renamed to this name. User may or may not have an ability to change the name.

member.name: CONFIRM_CONFLICT_ITEM.pszLocationShort
member.summary: A pointer to the short location.

member.name: CONFIRM_CONFLICT_ITEM.pszLocationFull
member.summary: A pointer to the full location.
